devDependenciesComments.@chiubaka/tsconfig: Shared TSConfig settings for the Chiubaka Technologies ecosystem
devDependenciesComments.@types/node: Types for NodeJS. Peer dependency of ts-node.
devDependenciesComments.eslint-config-prettier: Peer dependency of eslint-plugin-prettier to disable all formatting-related ESLint rules
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-eslint-comments: ESLint plugin for enforcing best practices around eslint-comments
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-jest: ESLint plugin for Jest best practices
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-package-json: ESLint plugin for linting package.json files
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-prettier: ESLint plugin for compatibility with Prettier
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-promise: ESLint plugin for best practices with promise
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-security: ESLint plugin for security best practices
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-simple-import-sort: ESLint plugin for sorting and organizing imports
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-unicorn: ESLint plugin with an amalgamation of best practices for JS
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-yml: ESLint plugin for linting YAML files
devDependenciesComments.husky: Modern native Git hooks made easy
devDependenciesComments.jest-junit: JUnit report formatter for Jest for compatibility with CircleCI test results format
devDependenciesComments.ts-jest: TypeScript preprocessor with source map support for Jest
devDependenciesComments.ts-node: To enable TypeScript configuration files for Jest
devDependenciesComments.yaml-eslint-parser: Peer dependency of eslint-plugin-yml. ESLint parser for YAML files.
